info.author: Rick Crook
classifiers: Intended Audience :: Financial and Insurance Industry
License :: OSI Approved :: Apache Software License
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Kaia is a backtesting and trading CLI using the PyAlgoTrade library. It currently is configured to work with Oanda broker account.

Installation
    $ pip install requests

Usage
    $ kaia --help
    Usage: kaia [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

    Options:
        --broker TEXT  set broker  [default: oanda]
        --help         Show this message and exit.

    Commands:
        backtest    Backtest strategy against market data (csv)...
        marketdata  Download market data from broker store as...
        trade       Parse back test results and start trading if...
info.name: kaia
info.summary: Kaia is a backtesting and trading CLI for the PyAlgoTrade library
info.html_description:
Kaia is a backtesting and trading CLI using the PyAlgoTrade library. It currently is configured to work with Oanda broker account.

Installation
$ pip install requests
Usage

$ kaia –help Usage: kaia [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]…

Options:
--broker TEXT set broker [default: oanda]
--help Show this message and exit.
Commands:
backtest Backtest strategy against market data (csv)… marketdata Download market data from broker store as… trade Parse back test results and start trading if…
